General.Name: Falmaco Nonwoven Industri PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Falmaco Nonwoven Industri Tbk manufactures and sells tissue products and nonwoven fabrics in Indonesia. The company's products include wet wipes, baby care products, daily wipes, and personal care products. Its products also include wet tissue, dry tissue, hand sanitizer, personal protective equipment, and sterile gauzes, as well as car carpets and spunlace fabrics. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Padalarang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Padalarang 289 Km 15.3, Padalarang, Indonesia, 40553
